claims.trackManage: Track and manage your union cases
claims.submitFirst: Submit your first case to get started

claims.assignedDescription: You are the assigned Labor Relations Officer for this claim. Update the status and add notes as the case progresses.
claims.needHelpText: Contact your union steward for assistance with any case. They can provide guidance, updates, and help escalate urgent matters.
claims.submitSuccessMessage: Your case has been received and assigned to a union representative.
claims.tellUsWhat: Tell us what happened. Your union is here to help.
claims.voiceRecordingInstructions: Record your case description with your voice. Click to start/stop recording.

analytics.analyticsDescription: Use these metrics to track union performance, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions. Monitor case resolution rates, member satisfaction, and steward performance to ensure effective representation.

reports.title: Visual Report Builder
reports.subtitle: Create custom reports without writing SQL
reports.gettingStartedDescription: Select a data source, add fields, apply filters, and choose a visualization type. Preview your report in real-time and save it for later use.
reports.reportSavedDescription: Your report '{name}' has been saved and is now available in your reports list.

settings.title: Organization Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your union's configuration
settings.adminOnlyDescription: These settings affect all members of your organization. Changes will be applied immediately.
settings.needHelpDescription: Contact support if you need assistance configuring your organization settings. Changes to security settings may require all members to re-authenticate.
settings.allowSelfRegistrationDescription: Members can register without admin approval
settings.requireEmailVerificationDescription: Members must verify their email address
settings.integrationsDescription: Connect external services to your organization
settings.alertThresholdDescription: Send alert when pending items exceed this number
settings.systemAlertsDescription: Notifications about system updates and maintenance
settings.securityComplianceDescription: Configure security policies and access controls
settings.enforceStrongPasswordsDescription: Require complex passwords with special characters
settings.allowedEmailDomainsDescription: Only users with these email domains can register
settings.ipWhitelistDescription: One IP address or CIDR range per line
settings.billingSubscriptionDescription: Manage your organization's subscription and payments

profile.title: My Profile & Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information, preferences, and account settings
profile.caseUpdatesDescription: When claims or grievances change status
profile.securityDescription: Manage your account security and authentication
profile.passwordRequirements: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
profile.twoFactorAuthenticationDescription: Add an extra layer of security
profile.enable2FADescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
profile.twoFactorEnabledDescription: You'll need to enter a code from your authenticator app when signing in
profile.appearanceDescription: Customize how UnionEyes looks for you
profile.autoThemeDescription: Auto theme switches between light and dark based on your system preferences
profile.compactModeDescription: Reduce spacing for a denser layout
profile.animationsDescription: Smooth transitions and effects throughout the app
profile.animationsPerformance: Disabling animations may improve performance on slower devices
profile.quickBrownFox: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
profile.sampleTextDescription: This is how text will appear in the app
profile.languageRegionDescription: Set your language and regional preferences
profile.languageChangeNote: Changes will take effect after you refresh the page
profile.timezoneDescription: Used for displaying dates, times, and scheduling meetings
profile.privacyDescription: Control your data and privacy preferences
profile.visibilityMembers: Members Only - Only union members can see
profile.profileVisibilityDescription: Choose who can view your profile information
profile.activityTrackingDescription: Help improve the platform with usage data
profile.downloadDataDescription: Download a copy of all your data including profile, claims, and documents
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how we handle your data
profile.helpAutoSave: Changes are saved automatically when you click Save Changes
profile.helpAdminFields: Some fields like Member Number and Local are managed by your union administrator
profile.help2FA: Enable Two-Factor Authentication for enhanced account security
profile.helpDataPrivacy: You can download all your data or delete your account under Privacy settings

welcome.subject: Welcome to Union Claims Management System
welcome.preview: Welcome to Union Claims Management System
welcome.heading: Welcome to Union Claims!
welcome.intro: Welcome to the Union Claims Management System. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.description: Our platform helps you manage union claims, track grievances, and collaborate with your team more effectively.
welcome.gettingStartedTitle: Here are some things you can do to get started:
welcome.supportText: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your Union Claims password
passwordReset.heading: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.intro: A password reset was requested for the Union Claims account associated with {userEmail}.
passwordReset.instruction: Click the button below to reset your password:
passwordReset.expiresIn: This link will expire in {minutes} minutes.
passwordReset.securityNote: If you didn't request this password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
passwordReset.securityReminder: For security reasons, we never send passwords via email.
passwordReset.troubleShooting: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste this URL into your browser:

deadlineAlert.normalText: This {itemType} has an upcoming deadline in {days} days.
deadlineAlert.managePreferences: To manage your deadline notifications, update your preferences.

digest.intro: Here's what happened in your Union Claims account:
digest.noNotificationsDaily: No new notifications this day. Check back later!
digest.noNotificationsWeekly: No new notifications this week. Check back later!

reportReady.subject: Your {reportType} report is ready
reportReady.heading: Your Report is Ready
reportReady.intro: Your {reportType} report has been generated and is ready for download.
reportReady.expiresOn: This link will expire on {date} at {time}.
reportReady.ignoreMessage: If you didn't request this report, you can safely ignore this email.

format.invalidSlug: Slug must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

length.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

password.requirementNotMet: New password does not meet security requirements
password.mismatch: New password and confirmation do not match
password.mustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password

workflow.mustHaveStart: Workflow must have a Start node
workflow.mustHaveEnd: Workflow must have an End node

availability.emailTaken: This email is already in use

messages.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
messages.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

fileUpload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select

help.supportMessage: Our union representatives are here to support you. Submit a case using voice input, check your agreements, or reach out to your steward for guidance.

forms.uploadInstructions: Click to upload or drag and drop
forms.uploadFormats: PDF, DOC, JPG, PNG up to 10MB
forms.whatHappenedWhen: What happened and when it occurred
forms.howAffected: How this affected you or others
forms.privacyNotice: Your case will be reviewed confidentially by your union steward. You'll receive updates via email at

home.badge: Built with Unions, Not for Unions
home.heroHeading: Empower Your Union With Intelligent Tools
home.heroDescription: AI-powered grievance management, claims processing, and member engagement — one platform for 4,773 union orgs.
home.missionDescription: Union Eyes was born in 2023 when a healthcare steward lost a winnable grievance because her notes were trapped in a spreadsheet. The employer had a million-dollar HR system. She had a notebook. We built this platform to level the playing field — because every worker deserves powerful tools, not just management.

story.badge: Built with Unions, Not for Unions
story.heroHeading: Union Eyes exists because workers deserve better than pen and paper
story.heroDescription: This platform was co-designed with union stewards who spent years managing grievances in spreadsheets, losing documents, and watching cases fall through the cracks while employers had million-dollar HR systems.
story.pageDescription: Union Eyes was built by people who understand labor, not Silicon Valley. This is why we exist.

pricing.heroDescription: No hidden fees. No tiered structures designed to confuse. Just fair pricing that scales with your union.
pricing.pageDescription: Simple, transparent pricing for unions of all sizes.

contact.heroDescription: We don’t do high-pressure sales. We’re here to answer questions and have a real conversation about your needs.
contact.pageDescription: Get in touch with the Union Eyes team.

caseStudies.heroDescription: Real case studies on how unions use Union Eyes to improve outcomes.
caseStudies.pageDescription: Discover how unions across Canada use Union Eyes.

pilotRequest.heroDescription: Join forward-thinking unions modernizing their operations with Union Eyes.
pilotRequest.pageDescription: Submit a pilot program application for Union Eyes.

status.heroDescription: Real-time status of Union Eyes services and infrastructure
status.pageDescription: Real-time status of Union Eyes services.

footer.description: AI-powered union management for 4,773 union organizations across Canada.
footer.tagline: Built with unions, not for unions.
